name: User Generated Content (Algemene reacties)
introduction: With User Generated Content, you add comment functionality to the project. This feature will be installed as a drag-and-drop component in the component library of the Channel manager.
description:
• This feature installs a new perspective: 'User Generated Content' in the CMS.
  • A configurable drag-and-drop component 'Comments' is added to the component library in the Channel Manager.
